snippet: Two lawmakers will propose letting the United States Anti-Doping Agency enforce antidoping standards and kick violators out of the sport.
abstract: Sen Tom Udall of New Mexico and Rep Joe Pitts of Pennsylvania plan to introduce Horseracing Integrity and Safety Act, bill giving United States Anti-Doping Agency authority to enforce antidoping standards in horse racing.
lead_paragraph: Two lawmakers will propose letting the United States Anti-Doping Agency enforce antidoping standards and kick violators out of the sport.

headline.seo: Proposed Bill Would Give Usada Authority Over Horse Racing
headline.main: Legislation Would Give Usada Authority Over Drugs in Racing
headline.print_headline: Legislation Would Give Usada Authority Over Drugs in Racing
